mapper.select: SELECT id, father_category_id, category_name, display_order, show_type, url, description, allow_comment, allow_publish, show_nav, created_date, last_modified_date, deleted FROM cms_category WHERE id =#{id} AND deleted =0 ORDER BY display_order ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT id,category_name,show_type,url,show_nav,deleted FROM cms_category WHERE father_category_id=#{id} AND deleted=0 ORDER BY display_order ASC

SELECT A.id,A.category_name,A.show_type,A.url,A.show_nav,A.deleted,B.id as sub_id,B.category_name as sub_category_name,B.show_type as sub_show_type,B.url as sub_url FROM cms_category A LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_category B on A.id=B.father_category_id and B.id>1 and B.deleted=0 WHERE A.id>1 and A.father_category_id=1 and A.deleted=0 and A.show_nav=1 ORDER BY A.display_order ASC,B.display_order ASC
SELECT id, category_name FROM cms_category WHERE allow_publish =1 AND deleted =0 LIMIT 0 , 30
SELECT COUNT( id ) FROM cms_category WHERE deleted =0 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT( id ) FROM cms_category WHERE father_category_id =#{id} AND deleted =0 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into cms_category ( father_category_id, category_name, allow_comment, display_order, url, deleted, description, keyword, allow_publish, show_type, created_date) values (#{fatherCategoryId}, #{categoryName}, #{allowComment}, #{displayOrder}, #{url}, #{deleted}, #{description}, #{keyWord}, #{allowPublish}, #{showType}, #{createddate})
